index15: Pizzaswap is an exchange that integrates defi, decentralized trading, liquidity mining, invitation and reward, and NFT. Our original intention is to commemorate the bitcoin and pizza deal
about1: How to participate in HFI POOL mining?
about2: 1. Open the official website (official website address) in any ETH wallet
about4: 3. Note: Take out the proceeds first, then unlock or increase the pledge, otherwise the proceeds will be lost
about5: 4. If you do not have HFI, please go to Uniswap to purchase HFI (click on the token address on the homepage)
about6: Each step takes about 1 minute, please be patient, please refresh the page if you wait too long
about7: How to buy HFI & token address?
about8: (1) In a wallet that supports ETH, open the UniSwap app and you can start trading
about11: HFI will mine evenly according to the market. The amount of users participating in Genesis mining is related to the amount of locked ETH and the length of lockup:
about12: Earnings calculation: user's hourly income = personal pledge amount / total amount of pledged mining pool * amount of HFI released per hour by mining pool
about13: Example: If the user pledged 100 HFIs, the total pledged amount at that time was 20,000. The mining pool releases 100 HFIs per hour, then the user's hourly earnings = 100/20,000 * 100 = 0.5 HFIs
about15: Friends who register through your invitation link will bind your wallet address by default
about16: (1) Get 10% mining power reward for direct push address
about17: (2) Get 5% mining power reward of indirect address
about19: Wait a minute, it will be displayed, all data is loaded through the blockchain network. If it does not appear for a long time, refresh the page.
